data.title: William Upton, Author at windwoodequestrian.com
data.text:
It’s September, school has started back, and the Pumkin Spice Latte has returned to Starbucks. You know what that means- it’s Fall! Time for sweaters, hot chocolate, cooler weather, and boots! One of the very best parts of the Autumn season is the beautiful color of all of the changing leaves. Oranges, yellows, and reds […]

Today is a very special day here at Windwood- it’s William and Arden’s third anniversary!!!! Time to celebrate! We’re so thankful for both of them and for the huge amount of love and respect they share for each other. Windwood is such a spectacular place because of their hard work, and it’s an absolutely wonderful […]

Happy Thursday, everyone! We have a very special blog post today in honor of one of our students in the Windwood lesson program, London Walker! She is the daughter of Ashley and Eric Walker. London just turned five and was surprised with every little girl’s dream, her first PONY! His name is Snow Day, and he […]

One of the most special parts of every bride’s wedding day is the beautiful arrangement of flowers she carries down the isle: her bouquet! Bouquets add the perfect pop of color and elegance to the bride’s gorgeous ensemble of hair, make up, shoes, dress, and veil. Your bouquet is a special piece of the wedding […]

This past weekend, we had a special guest visit Windwood! Arthur Kottas, who is a dressage LEGEND, came over and gave us some great tips! We absolutely loved having him here and everyone had a wonderful time meeting and speaking with him. Mr. Kottas was born in Vienna in 1945, and went to elementary and […]

Now for the most important piece of the wedding: YOUR DRESS! Just kidding, we know love is #1, but wedding dresses are right behind that. They’re the perfect outfit for brides, pretty and white and lacy and long. The best part about picking out your wedding dress is that there is so much to choose […]

Showing off your individual style at your wedding is important, and also so much fun! From the ceremony itself to the bridesmaid dresses, almost everything about your wedding can be your own idea! One of our favorite parts of the event that’s personal and customizable to every couple is the wedding cake topper. They’re a […]

It’s Friday, so that means we’re flashing back to one of the most amazing weddings at Windwood! It’s been two years since Jamie and Andrew tied the knot but we’re still having sweet dreams about how gorgeous the details of this wedding were! “It’s all in the details” is not just a phrase, it’s something […]

Windwood Equestrian has 2 openings for working students! If you love horses and want to pursue a career in a competitive equestrian field come learn with us! We are seeking a great individual who wants to learn first hand experience at one of Alabama’s finest equestrian centers. WORKING STUDENTS WILL HAVE OPPORTUNITIES TO: Work with top […]

This past Friday night, Windwood had the pleasure of hosting Kulture City. It was the kick-off to a fun-filled and celebrity spotting weekend! Kulture City has been doing amazing things in the community and we were so exited to be apart of this wonderful weekend. The organization was founded in 2013 and it provides needs […]
